alert.note: Alert for Joshua Tree NP West (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 26 at 3:20AM PST until November 26 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures in the upper 20s. * WHERE...Western portion of Joshua Tree National Park. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
